Sequence Information.Source: Solitary eumenid wasp,Anterhynchium flavomarginatum, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (40.91%) tofish Chrysophsin-3R: 32%; L=G=S=11%; GRAVY: -1.06; M Wt: 2375.844; Mol formula: C102H176N41O23S1; Mol ex coeff: 5550.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 16-32 ug/ml), S.enteritidis (MIC 128 ug/ml), and S.aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC>128 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC HC50>128 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Richter A, Sutherland D, Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, Li C, Coombe L, Lin D, Warren RL, Yanai A, Kotkoff M, Helbing CC, Hof F, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Associating biological activity and predicted structure of antimicrobial peptides from amphibians and insects
